entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
BREEZY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
